chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s1: state
a: action W A this
sc: schedule
s2: state
t: proc this W A

Goal:
pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t <-> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])

Premises:
DepMaps.pf : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> DepMaps.Label) (d : DepMaps.depmap labF), DepMaps.dmDom labF (DepMaps.dmap d)

pstep : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
action = Actions.action : world -> Type -> nid -> Type Arguments action _ _%type_scope
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
Module Actions := Struct Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Definition a_safe : forall (W : world) (V :
Inductive schedule : Set := ActStep : schedule | SeqRet : schedule | SeqStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectRet : schedule | WithInvStep : schedule -> schedule | WithInvRet : schedule
a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc this W A
allpairsP : reflect (exists p : ?S * ?T, [/\ p.1 \in ?s, p.2 \in ?t & ?z = ?f p.1 p.2]) (?z \in [seq ?f x y | x <- ?s, y <- ?t]) where ?S : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?R : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?f : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 :...
allpairsPdep : reflect (exists (x : ?S) (y : ?T x), [/\ x \in ?s, y \in ?t x & ?z = ?f x y]) (?z \in [seq ?f x y | x <- ?s, y <- ?t x]) where ?S : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ?S -> eqType] ?R : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?f : [this : nid W : world A : Type...
mapP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T1, x \in ?s & ?y = ?f x) (?y \in [seq ?f i | i <- ?s]) where ?T1 : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?T2 : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?f : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ?T1 -> ?T2] ?s : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this...
flatten_mapP : reflect (exists2 x : ?S, x \in ?s & ?y \in ?A x) (?y \in flatten [seq ?A i | i <- ?s]) where ?S : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType] ?A : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ?S -> seq ?T] ?s : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W...
all_and3 : implies (forall x : ?T, [/\ ?P1 x, ?P2 x & ?P3 x]) [/\ forall x : ?T, ?P1 x, forall x : ?T, ?P2 x & forall x : ?T, ?P3 x] where ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- Type] ?P1 : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ?T -> Prop] ?P2 : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ?T ->...-> Prop]
stepRet : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A) (v : A), pstep s1 (Ret v) sc s2 t < -> False
pstep_safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
uniqPn : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T), reflect (exists i j : nat, [/\ i < j, j < size s & nth x0 s i = nth x0 s j]) (~~ uniq s) where ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- eqType]
predk : forall V : Type, ?K -> simpl_pred (?K * V) where ?K : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- ordType]
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A0 : ?C), interp A0 -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [this : nid W : world A : Type s1 : state a : action W A this sc : schedule s2 : state t : proc this W A |- Type]
stepUnfin : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
proc_progress : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A), pstep s p sc s' p'
a_step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.step_total : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s' r

```coq
split; intros.
- intros v pf. exists v. exists pf. split; trivial.
- intros v pf H. exists (Act a). exists v. split; trivial. simpl. auto.
Qed.

original: split; intros. - intros v pf. exists v. exists pf. split; trivial. - intros v pf H. exists (Act a). exists v. split; trivial. simpl. auto.
